channel.title: How to send private msg to everyone?
channel.description:
Hi Can some please tell me how 'clans' send private messages to many people at once, (I get random messages from people asking them to join clans like Main Gp,,,,etc...) I want to do that to,but how to people do that in the real runescape??
,,,,,(does the person sending the message have to add al the friends he/she is going to send them too??) Also I am talking about the REAL runescape not the private server one
THANK YOU VERY MUCH! APPERECIATE VERY MUCH! :D

item.title: How to send private msg to everyone?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Ask the clans? I don’t know. Anyway, not server help.

Read full topic
item.source: How to send private msg to everyone?

item.title: How to send private msg to everyone?
item.dc:creator: @xmerchx xmerchx
item.description:
@xmerchx wrote:

YEh,
Clans in Runescape send private messages in random people to join their clan, and I would like to know how they do that.

I hope you understand

And thanks for the effort!

Read full topic
